alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Jackson; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 10:56AM CDT until March 25 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. While snow intensity has diminished, an additional half to 1 inch snow is possible, especially in Stephenson County. * WHERE...In Iowa, Jackson, Clinton and Scott Counties. In Illinois, Jo Daviess, Carroll, Whiteside, Stephenson and Rock Island Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Expect secondary roads to be snow covered and slick. Difficult travel is expected across the warned area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
